reporter_caption.center: IN MATTER OF RICHARDSON, 19 Wn. App. 1037 (1978)

caption.center: In the Matter of the Personal Restraint of LARRY F. RICHARDSON,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Thurston County, No. C-5613, Frank E. Baker, J., entered October 5, 1976.

opinion_text.unpublished: Reversed and remanded with instructions by unpublished opinion per Pearson, C.J., concurred in by Petrie and Reed, JJ.
